todos.title: Personal Growth
todos.body: Is there someone at work who encourages my personal development?

todos.title: Progress
todos.body: In the last six months have I talked with someone about my progress?

todos.title: Praise
todos.body: Have they received praise or recognition in the last 7 days?

todos.title: Care
todos.body: Does my supervisor care about me as a person?

todos.title: Expectations
todos.body: Do they know what is expected of them?

todos.title: Using Strengths
todos.body: Do they have the opportunity to do what I do best every day?

todos.title: Supplies
todos.body: Do they have the materials and equipment to get their job done?

todos.title: Value
todos.body: Do the feel in their bones that they are adding value to the organization?

todos.title: Opinions
todos.body: Do my opinions seem to count?

todos.title: Friends
todos.body: Do I have close friends at work?

todos.title: Mission
todos.body: Do I agree with my companies mission and does it make me feel important?

todos.title: Learning
todos.body: At work have I had opportunities to learn and grow?

todos.title: Quality
todos.body: Are my co-workers committed to quality work?
